reviews.customers_say: Customers find this turtleneck sweater to be a great everyday piece that keeps them warm in mid-west winters.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!
items.body: I’ve been looking for a heavy, comfortable, 100% cotton sweater and this perfectly fits the bill! I love it so much that I went back and bought it in a handful of colors. Flattering fits and true to size. Read more
items.author: Susan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, Soft, Quality Sweater
items.body: I am just a hair under 5’5” and weigh around 118 pounds. The XS fits wonderfully on me. I haven’t washed this beautiful sweater yet, but right out of the box, I’m super impressed with the quality! It is so soft, has a relaxed fit, and knit quality (in my opinion) is great for a 100% cotton sweater. Yes, it is a bit of a looser knit (you can see the “holes” created in pic #4 when I pull the sweater taut in the chest area), but because it’s a roomier fit, I will be able to wear a cami or tank underneath if I’m concerned about draftiness. You don’t NEED an under layer (the sweater isn’t see-through), but it might not be a bad idea for added warmth. At this price point, although it’s not the *best,* most high-quality sweater, I think it’s still a fantastic deal. It’s what I would expect in a $16 sweater, really. You can’t beat 100% cotton, either! 5 stars for now, but I will update after a few washes and wears. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater.
items.body: The sweater is made well, and has a rich green color. It's warm, but not overly stuffy. It's a stiffer material that's comfortable, but could feel restrictive to some. I would place it in the middle as far as softness and stretch are concerned. The sizing is tts. I sized down for a fitted look. If you want a loose/comfy look, order your size. If you want a slightly oversized look, order up. On me, it is shorter, and is nowhere near tunic length. I am a little over 5'8" with a long torso. My one-star deduction is because the neck opening is very small and has no stretch. I have a small head, and it was a tight fit. I can't even put it on a hanger normally; I have to come in from the bottom... Other than that, I'm happy with this item for the price I paid (~$13). Read more
items.author: Lucky Finds

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater
items.body: I like the sweater, both color and style. I am 5’6” 143lbs, got size S. Perfect fit. The true color is slightly duller than model picture. The sweater is light weight and too thin. Read more
items.author: Vivily Guess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the money- plan on ordering more
items.body: Excellent sweater, love the material (not itchy or fake feeling) the length is perfect, it fits true to size. I'm a medium and that is what I ordered and it is a perfect fit. It can be dressed up with a skirt and tall boots or you can wear it with a pair of jeans. Read more
items.author: L. Pregartner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find
items.body: This sweater is beyond comfortable. Thick and warm but not bulky. Can be dressed up or worn casually. Washed a few times (did not dry) and still looks brand new. Bought my usual size (M, 145lbs, 5’5). Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Finally, a good quality, well tailored sweater. Fits nicely across the shoulders, sleeve length great. Can't say enough. Forest green is a very nice color, exactly as pictured. Fabric is cotton and has a little weight to it. Size small was just right, as suggested. Read more
items.author: JAH

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent fit
items.body: I just received four of these sweaters in different colors, all size Medium. The colors are nice and the material is a good weight (not too heavy or too light) but the fit is wildly different from one to another. Only the dark red fits as it should. The taupe heather fits reasonably well overall but the sleeves are about an inch shorter and the neck opening is extremely tight, making it very difficult to pull on. Ditto the charcoal heather, and its sleeves are even shorter still. They could almost pass for 3/4 length. The worst is the sage heather. It's a beautiful color and the sleeves are plenty long, but it hangs almost to my knees like a shapeless sack. So, even though the price is right, I will not be buying any more of these sweaters. Read more
items.author: DenSha

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Chestnut Brown Heather, Forest Green, Taupe Heather, Camel Heather, Light Grey Heather, Blue, Burgundy, Cream, Black, Sage Green Heather, Dark Red, Olive, Red, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
